Trig039.speech: cosine 2 x, equals 2, cosine squared x, minus 1

Trig040.speech: the sine of, x over 2, equals plus or minus the square root of, the fraction with numerator 1 minus cosine x, and denominator 2

Trig042.speech: cosine x cosine y, equals 2, the cosine of, the fraction with numerator x plus y, and denominator 2, the cosine of, the fraction with numerator x minus y, and denominator 2

Trig044.speech: the tangent of, 3 pi over 8, equals, the fraction with numerator the square root of, the square root of 2, end root, plus 1, end root, and denominator the square root of, the square root of 2, end root, minus 1, end root

Trig045.speech: the tangent of, pi over 12, equals one half the square root of 2 minus the square root of 3, end root, end root
